entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Schefferville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:50 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -25.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Schefferville Airport 2:34 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -25.2°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -29.7°C
Wind: SSW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 38 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then periods of snow. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
